sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const BloodDonationCamps = () => { const [selectedCity, setSelectedCity] = useState(''); const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState(''); // Dummy donation camps data const donationCamps = [ { id: 1, name: "Community Blood Drive 2024", organizer: "Red Cross Society", city: "New York", address: "Central Park Community Center, 123 Park Ave, NY 10001", date: "2024-02-15", time: "9:00 AM - 5:00 PM", expectedDonors: 150, registeredDonors: 89, description: "Join us for our annual community blood drive. Free health checkup included.", requirements: ["Age 18+", "Weight 110+ lbs", "Good health", "Valid ID"], contact: "+1 (555) 123-4567", email: "nyc@redcross.org" }, { id: 2, name: "Corporate Blood Donation Day", organizer: "TechCorp Inc.", city: "San Francisco", address: "TechCorp Campus, 456 Innovation St, SF 94102", date: "2024-02-20", time: "8:00 AM - 6:00 PM", expectedDonors: 200, registeredDonors: 156, description: "TechCorp employees and public welcome. Refreshments provided.", requirements: ["Age 18+", "Weight 110+ lbs", "Good health", "Valid ID"], contact: "+1 (555) 987-6543", email: "blooddrive@techcorp.com" }, { id: 3, name: "University Blood Donation Camp", organizer: "State University Medical Center", city: "Chicago", address: "University Medical Center, 789 Campus Dr, Chicago 60601", date: "2024-02-25", time: "10:00 AM - 4:00 PM", expectedDonors: 100, registeredDonors: 67, description: "Students, faculty, and community members welcome. Educational session included.", requirements: ["Age 18+", "Weight 110+ lbs", "Good health", "Student ID or Valid ID"], contact: "+1 (555) 456-7890", email: "bloodcamp@stateuniversity.edu" }, { id: 4, name: "Emergency Blood Collection Drive", organizer: "City Emergency Services", city: "Miami", address: "Emergency Response Center, 321 Safety Blvd, Miami 33101", date: "2024-02-28", time: "24 Hours", expectedDonors: 300, registeredDonors: 234, description: "Emergency blood collection to replenish local blood banks.", requirements: ["Age 18+", "Weight 110+ lbs", "Good health", "Valid ID"], contact: "+1 (555) 789-0123", email: "emergency@cityservices.gov" }, { id: 5, name: "Faith Community Blood Drive", organizer: "Interfaith Council", city: "Seattle", address: "Community Church, 654 Faith Ave, Seattle 98101", date: "2024-03-05", time: "9:00 AM - 7:00 PM", expectedDonors: 80, registeredDonors: 45, description: "Multi-faith community coming together to save lives.", requirements: ["Age 18+", "Weight 110+ lbs", "Good health", "Valid ID"], contact: "+1 (555) 321-6540", email: "faith@interfaithcouncil.org" } ]; const cities = [...new Set(donationCamps.map(camp => camp.city))]; const filteredCamps = donationCamps.filter(camp => { const matchesCity = !selectedCity || camp.city === selectedCity; const matchesDate = !selectedDate || camp.date >= selectedDate; return matchesCity && matchesDate; }); const formatDate = (dateString) => { const options = { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }; return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options); }; const getDaysUntil = (dateString) => { const today = new Date(); const campDate = new Date(dateString); const diffTime = campDate - today; const diffDays = Math.ceil(diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); return diffDays; }; return (
{/* Header */}

Blood Donation Camps

Find and join upcoming blood donation events in your area

{/* Filters */}
setSelectedDate(e.target.value)} className="input-field" />
{/* Results Count */}

Found {filteredCamps.length} donation camp{filteredCamps.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''}

{/* Camps Grid */}
{filteredCamps.map(camp => { const daysUntil = getDaysUntil(camp.date); const isUpcoming = daysUntil > 0; const isToday = daysUntil === 0; return (
{/* Camp Info */}

{camp.name}

Organized by {camp.organizer}

{isToday ? 'Today' : isUpcoming ? `${daysUntil} day${daysUntil !== 1 ? 's' : ''} away` : 'Past'}
📍

{camp.city}

{camp.address}

📅

{formatDate(camp.date)}

{camp.time}

{camp.description}

Requirements:

{camp.requirements.map((req, index) => ( {req} ))}

Expected

{camp.expectedDonors}

Registered

{camp.registeredDonors}

Available

{camp.expectedDonors - camp.registeredDonors}

{/* Action Section */}

Contact Information

📞 {camp.contact}
✉️ {camp.email}
{isUpcoming || isToday ? ( <> ) : ( )}
); })}
{/* No Results */} {filteredCamps.length === 0 && (
🎪

No donation camps found

Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new camps

)} {/* Back to Home */}
← Back to Home
); }; export default BloodDonationCamps;
